name: saveFile
description: Saves the text_content of the file to the given filename. The directory is determined by the host, so only a filename can be given. No directory information must be included.

filename.description: The name of the file, including extension.

text_content.description: The content of the file must be complete and self-sufficient. In the context of programming, if the file contains code, it should encapsulate a complete functional entity, equivalent to a 'class' in object-oriented programming.
